metadata.title: Ashfaq Ahmad Khalil appointed Additional Secretary Information

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 30 (APP):The federal government has appointed Ashfaq Ahmad Khalil as the Additional Secretary Information and Broadcasting Division with immediate effect until further orders. According to a notification issued here, Khalil is a Grade 21 officer of the Information Group and was serving as Joint Secretary in the Information and Broadcasting Division on deputation basis.
